sentences.sentence: But now the problems are ricocheting back.
If you ever have that thought ricocheting in your brain, it will hurt a lot.
sentences.translation: 如果你曾经有过这个想法在你脑海里回旋，它会特别伤人。

sentences.sentence: Sometimes the impact sets off a whole ricocheting chain of further encounters.
sentences.translation: 有时这种影响又会引发一整串不断弹射的锁链，而这锁链正是由进一步的交汇所构成。
